location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'PROPOSED RESERVATION FOR REFINERY, WATER WELLS AND LINES, TO SITRA.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: blueprint on tracing paperDimensions: 250 x 500mm, on sheet 280 x 530mm

mods.abstract: Blueprint sketch map produced by the Bahrain Petroleum Company, depicting the proposed reservation of land for the refinery at Sitra [Sitrah], Bahrain. Enclosed with a letter no. C/504-10/1 (folio 17).Shows the refinery reservation covering 300 acres, and indicates the location of the triangulation station, water well reservation, the 80 feet wide strip of land, and the Sitra Terminal, with co-ordinates and measurements.
